Name: Sally
Text: Phew, I thought I'd be stuck talking to that guy for awhile.

Name: Sally
Text: Who do I have to thank for the rescue?

Name: William
Text: My name is William, and this here is University's Academic Advisor.

Name: Sally
Text: I didn't think other departments would help us.

Name: Sally
Text: My name is Sally. Thanks to you the Finance Region has been saved.

Name: William
Text: I didn't know it was so dire in the other departments. We thought COSC had it bad.

Name: William
Text: Maybe all the other regions need help too.

Name: William
Text: Sally, with your help, and the help of the Academic Advisor, we should see how your neighbours, the Science Region is doing.

Name: Sally
Text: We haven't heard from them since we've been invaded...

Name: Sally
Text: I hope they're doing better than we are.

Name: LU Student
Text: Sally has been unlocked as a Department Leader.

Name: LU Student
Text: The team colour Yellow for Finance has been unlocked.
